text: Addlove store in Mianyang Addlove () is a Chinese bakery chain, with headquarters in Deyang, Sichuan and offices in Chengdu and Mianyang."联系我们 ." Addlove. Retrieved on May 27, 2015. "爱达乐总公司: 四川省德阳市旌阳区工业集中发展区韶山路与渤海路交汇处" and 成都公司：成都市成华区华油路8号首汇观筑1单元10-12层" It was established in September 1996."爱达乐食品：全心全意传递爱" (Archive). 广东快网科技有限公司. Retrieved on May 27, 2015. As of 2009 it had over 70 restaurants."端午将至爱达乐“福粽”香飘旌城" (Archive). Deyang Daily Newspaper (德阳日报). May 15, 2009. Retrieved on May 27, 2015. Print version (Archive). "据悉，成立于1996年的四川爱达乐食品有限公司先后在省内开设了70多家分店，[...]" It formerly had the English name Adina."爱达乐—ADINA" (Archive). The 6th Chengdu Dragon-Boat Festival and Rice-Dumplings Culture Fair (2014端午食品博览会暨粽子文化节). Retrieved on May 27, 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Addlove * "以成都为“跳板”向外扩张" (Archive). Sichuan Daily. February 20, 2014. * "徳阳市工商联会员企业“爱达乐”用爱打造百年老店" (Archive). Sichuan Provincial General Chamber of Commerce (四川省工商业联合会). November 13, 2012. title: Addlove
